reviewText: We ordered a Doppio Zero pizza. The toppings for this pizza are burrata, prosciutto, and arugula. It was my favorite. I enjoy it more than the comparable one from Terun. We also ordered a Mortadella pizza. Its toppings included both mortadella and crumbled pistachio. It was good but not as good as the equivalent we had in Italy. The pistachio was too crunchy.
We ordered a Margherita pizza. It was good but not as good as the one from Doppio Zero. We also ordered a Diavola pizza. It was very good - nice and spicy.
